mapper.select: SELECT u.login_id AS login_id, u.user_name AS user_name, s.grade AS grade_year, -- 학년 d.name AS department_name, -- 학과 e.enrollment_id AS enrollment_id FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.user_id = s.user_id JOIN user u ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN department d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.course_id = #{courseId}
